00031 /* Indicates that an array has the length 0 (NULL indicates an non-defined array of length -1)*/
00032 #define UA_EMPTY_ARRAY_SENTINEL ((void*)0x01)

00041 typedef bool UA_Boolean;
00042 #define UA_TRUE true
00043 #define UA_FALSE false

00048 #define UA_SBYTE_MIN (-128)

00052 #define UA_BYTE_MAX 256
00053 #define UA_BYTE_MIN 0
00054

00057 #define UA_INT16_MAX 32767

00062 #define UA_UINT16_MAX 65535
00063 #define UA_UINT16_MIN 0

00091 /********************************************/
00092 /* String: A sequence of Unicode characters */
00093 /********************************************/
00094 typedef struct {
00095     size_t length; 
00096     UA_Byte *data; 
00097 } UA_String;
00098 
00099 UA_EXPORT extern const UA_String UA_STRING_NULL;
00100 
00101 static UA_INLINE UA_String UA_STRING(char *chars) {
00102     UA_String str; str.length = strlen(chars);
00103     str.data = (UA_Byte*)chars; return str; }
00104 
00105 #define UA_STRING_ALLOC(CHARS) UA_String_fromChars(CHARS)
00106     
00108 UA_String UA_EXPORT UA_String_fromChars(char const src[]) UA_FUNC_ATTR_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT;
00109 
00110 UA_Boolean UA_EXPORT UA_String_equal(const UA_String *s1, const UA_String *s2);
00111 
00112 /*********************************/
00113 /* DateTime: An instance in time */
00114 /*********************************/
00115 /* A DateTime value is encoded as a 64-bit signed integer which represents the
00116    number of 100 nanosecond intervals since January 1, 1601 (UTC) */
00117 typedef UA_Int64 UA_DateTime;
00118 
00119 UA_DateTime UA_EXPORT UA_DateTime_now(void); 
00120 
00121 typedef struct UA_DateTimeStruct {
00122     UA_UInt16 nanoSec;
00123     UA_UInt16 microSec;
00124     UA_UInt16 milliSec;
00125     UA_UInt16 sec;
00126     UA_UInt16 min;
00127     UA_UInt16 hour;
00128     UA_UInt16 day;
00129     UA_UInt16 month;
00130     UA_UInt16 year;
00131 } UA_DateTimeStruct;
00132 
00133 UA_DateTimeStruct UA_EXPORT UA_DateTime_toStruct(UA_DateTime time);
00134 
00135 UA_String UA_EXPORT UA_DateTime_toString(UA_DateTime time);
00136 
00137 /**************************************************************************/
00138 /* Guid: A 16 byte value that can be used as a globally unique identifier */
00139 /**************************************************************************/
00140 typedef struct {
00141     UA_UInt32 data1;
00142     UA_UInt16 data2;
00143     UA_UInt16 data3;
00144     UA_Byte   data4[8];
00145 } UA_Guid;
00146 
00147 UA_Boolean UA_EXPORT UA_Guid_equal(const UA_Guid *g1, const UA_Guid *g2);
00148 
00149 UA_Guid UA_EXPORT UA_Guid_random(UA_UInt32 *seed);
00150 
00151 /************************************/
00152 /* ByteString: A sequence of octets */
00153 /************************************/
00154 typedef UA_String UA_ByteString;
00155 
00156 static UA_INLINE UA_Boolean UA_ByteString_equal(const UA_ByteString *string1, const UA_ByteString *string2) {
00157     return UA_String_equal((const UA_String*)string1, (const UA_String*)string2); }
00158 
00159 /* Allocates memory of size length for the bytestring. The content is not set to zero. */
00160 UA_StatusCode UA_EXPORT UA_ByteString_allocBuffer(UA_ByteString *bs, size_t length) UA_FUNC_ATTR_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT;
00161 
00162 UA_EXPORT extern const UA_ByteString UA_BYTESTRING_NULL;
00163 
00164 static UA_INLINE UA_ByteString UA_BYTESTRING(char *chars) {
00165     UA_ByteString str; str.length = strlen(chars); str.data = (UA_Byte*)chars; return str; }
00166 
00167 static UA_INLINE UA_ByteString UA_BYTESTRING_ALLOC(const char *chars) {
00168     UA_String str = UA_String_fromChars(chars); UA_ByteString bstr;
00169     bstr.length = str.length; bstr.data = str.data; return bstr;
00170 }
00171

00177 /*****************************************************************************/
00178 /* NodeId: An identifier for a node in the address space of an OPC UA Server */
00179 /*****************************************************************************/
00180 enum UA_NodeIdType {
00181     UA_NODEIDTYPE_NUMERIC    = 0, 
00182     UA_NODEIDTYPE_STRING     = 3,
00183     UA_NODEIDTYPE_GUID       = 4,
00184     UA_NODEIDTYPE_BYTESTRING = 5
00185 };
00186 
00187 typedef struct {
00188     UA_UInt16 namespaceIndex;
00189     enum UA_NodeIdType identifierType;
00190     union {
00191         UA_UInt32     numeric;
00192         UA_String     string;
00193         UA_Guid       guid;
00194         UA_ByteString byteString;
00195     } identifier;
00196 } UA_NodeId;
00197 
00198 static UA_INLINE UA_Boolean UA_NodeId_isNull(const UA_NodeId *p) {
00199     return (p->namespaceIndex == 0 && p->identifierType == UA_NODEIDTYPE_NUMERIC &&
00200             p->identifier.numeric == 0);
00201 }
00202 
00203 UA_Boolean UA_EXPORT UA_NodeId_equal(const UA_NodeId *n1, const UA_NodeId *n2);
00204 
00205 UA_EXPORT extern const UA_NodeId UA_NODEID_NULL;
00206 
00207 static UA_INLINE UA_NodeId UA_NODEID_NUMERIC(UA_UInt16 nsIndex, UA_Int32 identifier) {
00208     UA_NodeId id; id.namespaceIndex = nsIndex; id.identifierType = UA_NODEIDTYPE_NUMERIC;
00209     id.identifier.numeric = identifier; return id; }
00210 
00211 static UA_INLINE UA_NodeId UA_NODEID_STRING(UA_UInt16 nsIndex, char *chars) {
00212     UA_NodeId id; id.namespaceIndex = nsIndex; id.identifierType = UA_NODEIDTYPE_STRING;
00213     id.identifier.string = UA_STRING(chars); return id; }
00214 
00215 static UA_INLINE UA_NodeId UA_NODEID_STRING_ALLOC(UA_UInt16 nsIndex, const char *chars) {
00216     UA_NodeId id; id.namespaceIndex = nsIndex; id.identifierType = UA_NODEIDTYPE_STRING;
00217     id.identifier.string = UA_STRING_ALLOC(chars); return id; }
00218 
00219 static UA_INLINE UA_NodeId UA_NODEID_GUID(UA_UInt16 nsIndex, UA_Guid guid) {
00220     UA_NodeId id; id.namespaceIndex = nsIndex; id.identifierType = UA_NODEIDTYPE_GUID;
00221     id.identifier.guid = guid; return id; }
00222 
00223 static UA_INLINE UA_NodeId UA_NODEID_BYTESTRING(UA_UInt16 nsIndex, char *chars) {
00224     UA_NodeId id; id.namespaceIndex = nsIndex; id.identifierType = UA_NODEIDTYPE_BYTESTRING;
00225     id.identifier.byteString = UA_BYTESTRING(chars); return id; }
00226 
00227 static UA_INLINE UA_NodeId UA_NODEID_BYTESTRING_ALLOC(UA_UInt16 nsIndex, const char *chars) {
00228     UA_NodeId id; id.namespaceIndex = nsIndex; id.identifierType = UA_NODEIDTYPE_BYTESTRING;
00229     id.identifier.byteString = UA_BYTESTRING_ALLOC(chars); return id; }

00231 /**********************************************************************************************/
00232 /* ExpandedNodeId: A NodeId that allows the namespace URI to be specified instead of an index */
00233 /**********************************************************************************************/
00234 typedef struct {
00235     UA_NodeId nodeId;
00236     UA_String namespaceUri;
00237     UA_UInt32 serverIndex;
00238 } UA_ExpandedNodeId;
00239 
00240 static UA_INLINE UA_ExpandedNodeId UA_EXPANDEDNODEID_NUMERIC(UA_UInt16 nsIndex, UA_Int32 identifier) {
00241     UA_ExpandedNodeId id; id.nodeId = UA_NODEID_NUMERIC(nsIndex, identifier);
00242     id.serverIndex = 0; id.namespaceUri = UA_STRING_NULL; return id; }
00243 
00244 static UA_INLINE UA_ExpandedNodeId UA_EXPANDEDNODEID_STRING(UA_UInt16 nsIndex, char *chars) {
00245     UA_ExpandedNodeId id; id.nodeId = UA_NODEID_STRING(nsIndex, chars);
00246     id.serverIndex = 0; id.namespaceUri = UA_STRING_NULL; return id; }
00247 
00248 static UA_INLINE UA_ExpandedNodeId UA_EXPANDEDNODEID_STRING_ALLOC(UA_UInt16 nsIndex, const char *chars) {
00249     UA_ExpandedNodeId id; id.nodeId = UA_NODEID_STRING_ALLOC(nsIndex, chars);
00250     id.serverIndex = 0; id.namespaceUri = UA_STRING_NULL; return id; }
00251 
00252 static UA_INLINE UA_ExpandedNodeId UA_EXPANDEDNODEID_STRING_GUID(UA_UInt16 nsIndex, UA_Guid guid) {
00253     UA_ExpandedNodeId id; id.nodeId = UA_NODEID_GUID(nsIndex, guid);
00254     id.serverIndex = 0; id.namespaceUri = UA_STRING_NULL; return id; }
00255 
00256 static UA_INLINE UA_ExpandedNodeId UA_EXPANDEDNODEID_BYTESTRING(UA_UInt16 nsIndex, char *chars) {
00257     UA_ExpandedNodeId id; id.nodeId = UA_NODEID_BYTESTRING(nsIndex, chars);
00258     id.serverIndex = 0; id.namespaceUri = UA_STRING_NULL; return id; }
00259 
00260 static UA_INLINE UA_ExpandedNodeId UA_EXPANDEDNODEID_BYTESTRING_ALLOC(UA_UInt16 nsIndex, const char *chars) {
00261     UA_ExpandedNodeId id; id.nodeId = UA_NODEID_BYTESTRING_ALLOC(nsIndex, chars);
00262     id.serverIndex = 0; id.namespaceUri = UA_STRING_NULL; return id; }

00265 /* QualifiedName: A name qualified by a namespace */

00267 typedef struct {
00268     UA_UInt16 namespaceIndex; 
00269     UA_String name; 
00270 } UA_QualifiedName;
00271 
00272 static UA_INLINE UA_QualifiedName UA_QUALIFIEDNAME(UA_UInt16 nsIndex, char *chars) {
00273     UA_QualifiedName qn; qn.namespaceIndex = nsIndex; qn.name = UA_STRING(chars); return qn; }
00274 
00275 static UA_INLINE UA_QualifiedName UA_QUALIFIEDNAME_ALLOC(UA_UInt16 nsIndex, const char *chars) {
00276     UA_QualifiedName qn; qn.namespaceIndex = nsIndex; qn.name = UA_STRING_ALLOC(chars); return qn; }

00278 /*************************************************************************/
00279 /* LocalizedText: Human readable text with an optional locale identifier */
00280 /*************************************************************************/
00281 typedef struct {
00282     UA_String locale; 
00283     UA_String text; 
00284 } UA_LocalizedText;
00285 
00286 static UA_INLINE UA_LocalizedText UA_LOCALIZEDTEXT(char *locale, char *text) {
00287     UA_LocalizedText lt; lt.locale = UA_STRING(locale);
00288     lt.text = UA_STRING(text); return lt; }
00289 
00290 static UA_INLINE UA_LocalizedText UA_LOCALIZEDTEXT_ALLOC(const char *locale, const char *text) {
00291     UA_LocalizedText lt; lt.locale = UA_STRING_ALLOC(locale);
00292     lt.text = UA_STRING_ALLOC(text); return lt; }

00294 /* Forward Declaration of UA_DataType */
00295 struct UA_DataType;
00296 typedef struct UA_DataType UA_DataType; 
00297 
00298 /********************************************************************************/
00299 /* ExtensionObject: A structure that contains an application specific data type */
00300 /* that may not be recognized by the receiver                                   */
00301 /********************************************************************************/
00302 typedef struct {
00303     enum {
00304         UA_EXTENSIONOBJECT_ENCODED_NOBODY     = 0,
00305         UA_EXTENSIONOBJECT_ENCODED_BYTESTRING = 1,
00306         UA_EXTENSIONOBJECT_ENCODED_XML        = 2,
00307         UA_EXTENSIONOBJECT_DECODED            = 3, 
00308         UA_EXTENSIONOBJECT_DECODED_NODELETE   = 4  
00309     } encoding;
00310     union {
00311         struct {
00312             UA_NodeId typeId; 
00313             UA_ByteString body; 
00314         } encoded;
00315         struct {
00316             const UA_DataType *type;
00317             void *data;
00318         } decoded;
00319     } content;
00320 } UA_ExtensionObject;
00321 
00322 /*********************************************/
00323 /* Variant: Stores (arrays of) any data type */
00324 /*********************************************/
00325  /* Variants either they provide a pointer to the data in memory, or functions
00326     from which the data can be accessed. Variants are replaced together with
00327     the data they store (exception: use a data source).
00328 
00329     Variant semantics:
00330     - arrayLength == 0 && data == NULL: no existing data
00331     - arrayLength == 0 && data == 0x01: array of length 0
00332     - arrayLength == 0 && data > 0x01: scalar value
00333     - arrayLength > 0: array of the given length
00334  */
00335 typedef struct {
00336     const UA_DataType *type; 
00337     enum {
00338         UA_VARIANT_DATA, 
00339         UA_VARIANT_DATA_NODELETE, 
00343     } storageType; 
00344     size_t arrayLength;  
00345     void *data; 
00346     size_t arrayDimensionsSize; 
00347     UA_UInt32 *arrayDimensions; 
00348 } UA_Variant;
00349 
00357 static UA_INLINE UA_Boolean UA_Variant_isScalar(const UA_Variant *v) {
00358     return (v->arrayLength == 0 && v->data > UA_EMPTY_ARRAY_SENTINEL); }
00359     
00368 void UA_EXPORT UA_Variant_setScalar(UA_Variant *v, void * UA_RESTRICT p, const UA_DataType *type);
00369 
00378 UA_StatusCode UA_EXPORT UA_Variant_setScalarCopy(UA_Variant *v, const void *p, const UA_DataType *type);
00379 
00389 void UA_EXPORT
00390 UA_Variant_setArray(UA_Variant *v, void * UA_RESTRICT array, size_t arraySize, const UA_DataType *type);
00391 
00401 UA_StatusCode UA_EXPORT
00402 UA_Variant_setArrayCopy(UA_Variant *v, const void *array, size_t arraySize, const UA_DataType *type);
00403 
00404 /* NumericRanges are used select a subset in a (multidimensional) variant array.
00405  * NumericRange has no official type structure in the standard. On the wire, it
00406  * only exists as an encoded string, such as "1:2,0:3,5". The colon separates
00407  * min/max index and the comma separates dimensions. A single value indicates a
00408  * range with a single element (min==max). */
00409 typedef struct {
00410     size_t dimensionsSize;
00411     struct UA_NumericRangeDimension {
00412         UA_UInt32 min;
00413         UA_UInt32 max;
00414     } *dimensions;
00415 } UA_NumericRange;
00416 
00426 UA_StatusCode UA_EXPORT
00427 UA_Variant_copyRange(const UA_Variant *src, UA_Variant *dst, const UA_NumericRange range);
00428 
00440 UA_StatusCode UA_EXPORT
00441 UA_Variant_setRange(UA_Variant *v, void * UA_RESTRICT array, size_t arraySize, const UA_NumericRange range);
00442 
00452 UA_StatusCode UA_EXPORT
00453 UA_Variant_setRangeCopy(UA_Variant *v, const void *array, size_t arraySize, const UA_NumericRange range);
00454 
00455 /**************************************************************************/
00456 /* DataValue: A data value with an associated status code and timestamps. */
00457 /**************************************************************************/
00458 typedef struct {
00459     UA_Boolean    hasValue             : 1;
00460     UA_Boolean    hasStatus            : 1;
00461     UA_Boolean    hasSourceTimestamp   : 1;
00462     UA_Boolean    hasServerTimestamp   : 1;
00463     UA_Boolean    hasSourcePicoseconds : 1;
00464     UA_Boolean    hasServerPicoseconds : 1;
00465     UA_Variant    value;
00466     UA_StatusCode status;
00467     UA_DateTime   sourceTimestamp;
00468     UA_Int16      sourcePicoseconds;
00469     UA_DateTime   serverTimestamp;
00470     UA_Int16      serverPicoseconds;
00471 } UA_DataValue;

00473 /***************************************************************************/
00474 /* DiagnosticInfo: A structure that contains detailed error and diagnostic */
00475 /* information associated with a StatusCode.                               */
00476 /***************************************************************************/
00477 typedef struct UA_DiagnosticInfo {
00478     UA_Boolean    hasSymbolicId          : 1;
00479     UA_Boolean    hasNamespaceUri        : 1;
00480     UA_Boolean    hasLocalizedText       : 1;
00481     UA_Boolean    hasLocale              : 1;
00482     UA_Boolean    hasAdditionalInfo      : 1;
00483     UA_Boolean    hasInnerStatusCode     : 1;
00484     UA_Boolean    hasInnerDiagnosticInfo : 1;
00485     UA_Int32      symbolicId;
00486     UA_Int32      namespaceUri;
00487     UA_Int32      localizedText;
00488     UA_Int32      locale;
00489     UA_String     additionalInfo;
00490     UA_StatusCode innerStatusCode;
00491     struct UA_DiagnosticInfo *innerDiagnosticInfo;
00492 } UA_DiagnosticInfo;

00498 #define UA_MAX_TYPE_MEMBERS 13 // Maximum number of members per structured type
00499 
00500 typedef struct {
00501 #ifdef ENABLE_TYPEINTROSPECTION
00502     const char *memberName;
00503 #endif
00504     UA_UInt16   memberTypeIndex;   
00505     UA_Byte     padding;           
00508     UA_Boolean  namespaceZero : 1; 
00511     UA_Boolean  isArray       : 1; 
00512 } UA_DataTypeMember;
00513     
00514 struct UA_DataType {
00515 #ifdef ENABLE_TYPEINTROSPECTION
00516     const char *typeName;
00517 #endif
00518     UA_NodeId   typeId;           
00519     UA_UInt16   memSize;          
00520     UA_UInt16   typeIndex;        
00521     UA_Byte     membersSize;      
00522     UA_Boolean  builtin      : 1; 
00523     UA_Boolean  fixedSize    : 1; 
00524     UA_Boolean  zeroCopyable : 1; 
00525     UA_DataTypeMember members[UA_MAX_TYPE_MEMBERS];
00526 };
00527 
00534 void UA_EXPORT * UA_new(const UA_DataType *type) UA_FUNC_ATTR_MALLOC;
00535 
00542 static UA_INLINE void UA_init(void *p, const UA_DataType *type) {
00543     memset(p, 0, type->memSize); }
00544 
00554 UA_StatusCode UA_EXPORT
00555 UA_copy(const void *src, void *dst, const UA_DataType *type) UA_FUNC_ATTR_WARN_UNUSED_RESULT;
00556 
00566 void UA_EXPORT UA_deleteMembers(void *p, const UA_DataType *type);

00617 /* These are not generated from XML. Server *and* client need them. */
00618 typedef enum {
00619     UA_ATTRIBUTEID_NODEID                  = 1,
00620     UA_ATTRIBUTEID_NODECLASS               = 2,
00621     UA_ATTRIBUTEID_BROWSENAME              = 3,
00622     UA_ATTRIBUTEID_DISPLAYNAME             = 4,
00623     UA_ATTRIBUTEID_DESCRIPTION             = 5,
00624     UA_ATTRIBUTEID_WRITEMASK               = 6,
00625     UA_ATTRIBUTEID_USERWRITEMASK           = 7,
00626     UA_ATTRIBUTEID_ISABSTRACT              = 8,
00627     UA_ATTRIBUTEID_SYMMETRIC               = 9,
00628     UA_ATTRIBUTEID_INVERSENAME             = 10,
00629     UA_ATTRIBUTEID_CONTAINSNOLOOPS         = 11,
00630     UA_ATTRIBUTEID_EVENTNOTIFIER           = 12,
00631     UA_ATTRIBUTEID_VALUE                   = 13,
00632     UA_ATTRIBUTEID_DATATYPE                = 14,
00633     UA_ATTRIBUTEID_VALUERANK               = 15,
00634     UA_ATTRIBUTEID_ARRAYDIMENSIONS         = 16,
00635     UA_ATTRIBUTEID_ACCESSLEVEL             = 17,
00636     UA_ATTRIBUTEID_USERACCESSLEVEL         = 18,
00637     UA_ATTRIBUTEID_MINIMUMSAMPLINGINTERVAL = 19,
00638     UA_ATTRIBUTEID_HISTORIZING             = 20,
00639     UA_ATTRIBUTEID_EXECUTABLE              = 21,
00640     UA_ATTRIBUTEID_USEREXECUTABLE          = 22
00641 } UA_AttributeId;
00642 
00643 typedef enum {
00644     UA_ACCESSLEVELMASK_READ = 0x01,
00645     UA_ACCESSLEVELMASK_WRITE = 0x02,
00646     UA_ACCESSLEVELMASK_HISTORYREAD = 0x4,
00647     UA_ACCESSLEVELMASK_HISTORYWRITE = 0x08,
00648     UA_ACCESSLEVELMASK_SEMANTICCHANGE = 0x10
